_header: Jesu my lover and my delight
Subjects: prayers, by Christ and His Passion; virtues
_description: A prayer by the Passion for Chastity — fourteen couplets

Lam541.First Lines:
Iesu my louer And my deliteIn þi loue make me
                    perfite…
Lam541.Last Lines:
…þes permisses good iesu grante to meþat in heuyn
                    blisse y may þe see
Lam541.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Five Middle English Verse Prayers from Lambeth MS. 541.” 
             Neophilologus
         38 (1954): 36-41: 40-1.

Mazar514.First Lines:
Ihesu my loue and my delytIn þi loue make me
                    parfyt…
Mazar514.Last Lines:
…Ihesu swete barn bestIn þi loue make me
                    stedfest
